Author: Taurenkey, croizat
Name: Pandora's Box
Punchline: Do you dare to open Pandora's Box?
Description:
Pandora's Box is a collection of major QoL tweaks and adjustments.

Open the box with /pandora
Changelog: - Active-Time Maneuver Solver should now work with Direct Chat mode and will close chat if open to keep mashing
